title: DWA RAZY TYLE
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Czuję jak, czuję jak, czuję jak, czuję jak tam było nam
lines.translation: I feel like, I feel like, I feel like, I feel like we were there
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Uu, uu
lines.translation: Ooh, ooh
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Uu, uu
lines.translation: Ooh, ooh
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Uu
lines.translation: Uu
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Chyba coś znaczy ta dwójka obok siódemki
lines.translation: I guess that two next to the seven means something
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Do tego jedyne światła, w które zmierzam to niebieskie
lines.translation: Plus the only lights I'm heading towards are blue ones
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Jebany nie daje zasnąć, kiedy głowa mówi "zdechnij" mi
lines.translation: Fucking doesn't let me sleep when my head says "die"
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Kiedy ja próbuję żyć
lines.translation: When I try to live
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Ale wcześniej to chciałbym coś zostawić
lines.translation: But first I would like to leave something behind.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Robię materiały, a nie jestem materiałem na nic jak Onlyfansiary
lines.translation: I make materials, but I'm not material for anything like Onlyfansiary
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Proszę, pokaż mi, w którym miejscu i za co kochasz mnie
lines.translation: Please show me where and why you love me
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Póki jestem, dopóki jestem tu
lines.translation: As long as I am, as long as I am here
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Czuję dwa razy tyle, jakby było nas dwóch (dwóch)
lines.translation: I feel twice as much as if there were two of us (two)
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Jakby było, jakby było nas dwóch
lines.translation: As if there were two of us
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Czuję dwa razy tyle, jakby było nas dwóch
lines.translation: I feel twice as much as if there were two of us
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Czuję tyle, cz-cz-czuję tyle, to posłuchaj
lines.translation: I feel so much, I-I feel so much, so listen
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Kocham dwa razy bardziej, jakby było nas dwóch
lines.translation: I love you twice as much as if there were two of us
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: (To czemu, czemu) to czemu chcesz mnie zostawić?
lines.translation: (So why, why) so why do you want to leave me?
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Bez ciebie nie dam rady
lines.translation: I can't do it without you
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Proszę, pomóż mi go zabić
lines.translation: Please help me kill him
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Powinno mi odpierdolić, gdy patrzę na te cyferki
lines.translation: I should lose my mind when I look at these numbers
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Widzę tylko, ile ludzi dalej trzyma mnie na pętli
lines.translation: I just see how many people still keep me in the loop
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Coraz trudniej o tym gadać, kiedy wiem, co myślałaś kiedyś, wiem
lines.translation: It's getting harder to talk about it now that I know what you used to think, I know
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: To przesada, kiedy wiem, wiem, wiem, wiem
lines.translation: It's an exaggeration when I know, I know, I know, I know
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Mam tyle siana, że już nie mam prawa chodzić smutnym
lines.translation: I have so much hay that I have no right to walk around sadly anymore
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Łzy się wylewają, ale z supercara, a nie spod poduszki
lines.translation: Tears are shed, but from the supercar, not from under the pillow
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Ma-ma-mała, chcę, byś pamiętała skąd się wzięło tu tyle łez
lines.translation: Mommy, I want you to remember where all these tears came from.
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.

lines.text: Pamiętaj, że
lines.translation: Remember that
lines.grammar: Polish line; watch Slavic case endings and aspectual verb choice.
